alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:23PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Box Elder County through 715 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Utah Test and Training Range North to 12 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Gunnison Island, Hat Island and Lakeside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
